commonAnswerForUsersMessage: You said: '_%s_', but this bot very simple and do only actions below: ⬇
greetingUser: Hello, %s! This is my simple Telegram bot on Java Spring! Please, use menu below to know more about it ⬇:
generalInfo:
This is simple project to show my experience in Java and related technologies (see "*technology stack*"); 

The bot can output text, images and give information by pressing the buttons.

Think of it like a business card bot.
See the project via this [GitHub link](https://github.com/RenJeka/Study/tree/master/Java_projects/hello-lambda-core)
businessCard:
My name is Yevhenii Petrushenko.

I am 29 y.o. Front-end developer who specializes in websites and single-page application (SPA) development.

My expertise is Angular 2+, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML / CSS (+ any preprocessors), RxJS, Unit and e2e Tests, GIT, Jira etc...

I have 3+ years commercial experience and work with various technologies in different commands.

I am friendly, sociable, fond of sports, psychology, technology, business and much more 😊

➡️You can visit my portfolio by clicking on [this portfolio link](http://yevhenii.website/).

➡️You can also visit my github by clicking on [this github link](https://github.com/RenJeka).

➡️Of course, you can contact me by clicking on [this telegram link](https://t.me/RenJeka).
